mapper.update:
update public.t_erp_shop
shop_name = #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
platform_type = #{platformType,jdbcType=INTEGER},
platform_account = #{platformAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
shop_manager_user_id = #{shopManagerUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
state = #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_user_id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
modify_user_name = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
last_modify_date = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
is_use = #{isUse,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
main_account = #{mainAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
account_type = #{accountType,jdbcType=SMALLINT},
refresh_token_timeout = #{refreshTokenTimeout,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
resource_owner = #{resourceOwner,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
refresh_token = #{refreshToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
access_token = #{accessToken,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
expires_in = #{expiresIn,jdbcType=BIGINT},

merchant_user_id = #{merchantUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
last_sync_date = #{lastSyncDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update public.t_erp_shop set shop_name = #{shopName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, platform_type = #{platformType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, platform_account = #{platformAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, token = #{token,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, shop_manager_user_id = #{shopManagerUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, state = #{state,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_user_id = #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, create_user_name = #{createUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_date = #{createDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_user_id = #{modifyUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, modify_user_name = #{modifyUserName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_date = #{modifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, last_modify_date = #{lastModifyDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, is_use = #{isUse,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, main_account = #{mainAccount,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, account_type = #{accountType,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, last_sync_date = #{lastSyncDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select sh.shop_id, sh.shop_name, sh.platform_type, sh.platform_account, sh.token, sh.shop_manager_user_id, sh.state, sh.enterprise_id, sh.create_user_id, sh.create_user_name, sh.create_date, sh.modify_user_id, sh.refresh_token_timeout,sh.resource_owner,sh.refresh_token,sh.access_token,sh.expires_in,sh.token_create_date,sh.aliid,sh.merchant_user_id, sh.modify_user_name,sh.modify_date, sh.last_modify_date,sh.is_use,sh.main_account,sh.account_type,us.user_name as shop_manager_user_name from public.t_erp_shop sh left join platform.t_platform_pm_user us on us.user_id = sh.shop_manager_user_id and sh.enterprise_id = us.enterprise_id where sh.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and sh.shop_id = #{shopId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
